summary: A utility script that translates UniDiffuser model components—including VAE, UNet, caption decoder, and scheduler—into the configuration and checkpoint format expected by the HuggingFace Diffusers library, allowing the models to be loaded and used with Diffusers pipelines.
business_intent: Facilitate migration of UniDiffuser checkpoints to the Diffusers ecosystem so that developers can leverage existing Diffusers tools for inference, fine‑tuning, and deployment without retraining the models.
